name: vapi-ghl-integration
description: Lambda function to process VAPI post-call webhooks and update GHL contacts

scripts.deploy: zip -r function.zip . -x "*.zip" "*-BACKUP-*" "response-*.json" "test-*.json" "test-*.js" "*test*.js" "*.md" ".git/*" ".gitignore" "node_modules/.cache/*" "coverage/*" ".vscode/*" ".idea/*" "*.log" "docs/*" "run-tests.sh" "realistic-test-payload.json" "postman-*.json" "test-payload-*" && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name vapi-ghl-integration --zip-file fileb://function.zip
scripts.create-function: aws lambda create-function --function-name vapi-ghl-integration --runtime nodejs22.x --role arn:aws:iam::YOUR_ACCOUNT:role/lambda-execution-role --handler index.handler --zip-file fileb://function.zip --timeout 60 --memory-size 256
